issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When creating Button or Label and trying to set right property (to be positioned from right) it is not working.
The same maybe the case for bottom property.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: A view's right and bottom properties are not working

comments.body:
Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311122225
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131113094843
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0
BlackBerry Simulator: 10.2.0.1791

Test Case
{code}var win = Titanium.UI.createWindow({backgroundColor:'#fff'});
var label = Titanium.UI.createLabel({text:'Bottom Right Corner', width:'auto', bottom:'10', right:'10'});
win.add(label);
win.open();{code}

Label is shown in the bottom right corner. Therefore bottom and right are working.
Closing.
